thread.title: Laura Prepon & Ben Foster Expecting First Child!
thread.title_full: Laura Prepon & Ben Foster Expecting First Child!

author: Just Jared
title: Laura Prepon & Ben Foster Expecting First Child!
text:
Laura Prepon and her fiancé Ben Foster are expecting their first baby, according to People ! 
The 36-year-old Orange Is the New Black star and the 36-year-old actor got engaged last October after dating for several months. 
The couple were most recently spotted at the Sundance Film Festival , where they cozied up at the Creative Coalition’s annual Spotlight Awards. 
“ Ben seemed really protective and kept very close to Laura the entire night. He was holding on to her arm as they walked in and kept by her side during the dinner. Neither of them got up much to mingle. They definitely enjoyed dinner,” a source explained.
Congratulations to Laura and Ben !
